channel.title: Recruiting For The = Rs2 Forum =
channel.description:
A New Forum Designed Plain And Perfect. We Discuss many topics including RuneScape, Designs, Servers, Cheating, Movies, Games and Even The Real Zezima On Forums.
We currently started this forum when we had The Official Zezima Website Which Got Shutdown. Anyways We Got Alot Of Things Open Just For You!
[b]Open: Forum Safety (5) People Middle Man (5) People Coder (15) People Graphics Mod (10) People[/b]
Just Post If You Wanna Apply. Hope to receive some new loyal members!
~ Have Fun.
